summary: When their best friends announce that they're separating, a professor and his wife discover the faults in their own marriage.
cast: Nick Metropolis|Woody Allen|Mia Farrow|Sydney Pollack|Judy Davis|Jeffrey Kurland|Bruce Jay Friedman|Cristi Conaway|Timothy Jerome|Rebecca Glenn|Juliette Lewis|Galaxy Craze|Lysette Anthony|Benno Schmidt|John Doumanian|Gordon Rigsby|Liam Neeson|Ilene Blackman|Ron Rifkin|Blythe Danner|Brian McConnachie|Ron August|John Bucher|Matthew Flint|Jerry Zaks|Caroline Aaron|Jack Richardson|Nora Ephron|Ira Wheeler|Kenneth Edelson|Michelle Turley|Victor Truro|Kenny Vance|Lisa Gustin|Anthony Nocerino|Philip Levy|Connie Picard|Steven Randazzo|Tony Turco|Adelaide Mestre|Jessica Frankston|Merv Bloch|David Boston|Edward Burke|Kent Kasper|Diane Kimbrell|Fred Melamed
title: Maridos y mujeres
